headline: Best Quant-rated small- and mid-cap healthcare stocks as LLY hits $1T in market cap
synthesis: This ties into broader market movement and sentiment.

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: "Cash, let’s dive into the top-rated small- and mid-cap healthcare stocks as LLY crosses that $1 trillion milestone."

timeline.speaker: cash
timeline.text: It seems the stakes are as high as the prices shoppers are facing this season.

timeline.speaker: cash
timeline.text: The surge of LLY to a $1 trillion market cap underscores the growing investor confidence in the healthcare sector, particularly among smaller firms. As attention shifts to quant-rated stocks, it suggests that data-driven strategies are becoming increasingly pivotal in navigating market trends. This development could signal a shift in investment focus, as smaller players may soon capture greater interest.

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: Turning now to developments in the healthcare sector.
